aka: Paul Blanca, This Film will Save Your Life
this_title: Paul Blanca, deze film redt je leven
trans_title: Paul Blanca, This Film will Save Your Life
introduction: Film about the photographer Paul Blanca, who after a lifetime of drug- and alcohol abuse died at the age of 62, in October 2021. In a possibly futile attempt to save a fading life from an inglorious demise, filmmaker Ramon Gieling filmed Paul Blanca on what turned out to be his last journey. With the camera we witness Paul Blanca's struggle against the transience of his body and the inexorable passing of time. Until finally only photos remain.
chinese_title: Paul Blanca, deze film redt je leven
